response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, with an estimated worth of $1,000,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. This exclusive deal allows you to acquire a piece that is not only valuable but also carries a unique story and craftsmanship. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
